name: UAV Aerial Works
about: UAV Aerial Works flying school specializes in comprehensive drone training and operations, prioritizing safety and quality. Our management team includes experienced professionals like Bertus van Zyl, a skilled aviator and CAA appointed Designated RPAS Examiner, and Andre Swart, a former Commanding Officer with extensive military flying hours. We offer training in drone security operations, hands-on flight practice, and theoretical courses. Our instructors are certified commercial drone pilots and safety experts, ensuring students receive thorough training in UAS systems, mission planning, and operational excellence. We are committed to operational safety and excellence, preparing students to become proficient drone pilots ready for various industry applications. Our goal is to ensure every student is equipped with the skills and knowledge necessary to succeed in the field of unmanned aerial systems.
